about_the_game:
You died, and have been Isekai'd into a world where you are Pizza.
You cannot doubt that this is awesome.

Use Various Weapons to Put Holes in Your Favorite Foods!
- Use a Caesar's Downfall to decimate all visible enemies!
- Use a Howie's Little Friend to smack your adversaries into the next dimension!
- Use a The Domino Effect to burn your way through obstacles!

Explore a Large Level and Encounter Various Enemies
- An agile breadstick that breaks into two and will try to slice you up!
- A cowardly chicken wing that runs away, and throws molotovs to overcook you!
- A hefty deep dish pizza that can tank much more than your own thin crust!

Credits

Secret Ten Studios:

Zane O'Dell (Producer and Weapon/Systems/Dialogue/UI Engineer)

Suraj Karthikeyan (Producer/Systems Engineer/VFX Artist/Sound Designer/Weapon Engineer & Designer)

Farhan Parekh (2D Artist)

Connor Miller (Level Designer/UI Designer/Weapon Designer/Mechanics Designer/Gameplay Designer/Animation Programmer)

Andrew Tran (Level Designer)

Eli Mcardle (Movement Programmer)

Ryan Chang (AI Engineer)

Matthew DeBoer (Gameplay Programmer)

Elex McCoy (Game Writer)

Lyndsay Mohr (Sound Designer)

Chari Bayar (Composer)
detailed_description:
You died, and have been Isekai'd into a world where you are Pizza.
You cannot doubt that this is awesome.

Use Various Weapons to Put Holes in Your Favorite Foods!
- Use a Caesar's Downfall to decimate all visible enemies!
- Use a Howie's Little Friend to smack your adversaries into the next dimension!
- Use a The Domino Effect to burn your way through obstacles!

Explore a Large Level and Encounter Various Enemies
- An agile breadstick that breaks into two and will try to slice you up!
- A cowardly chicken wing that runs away, and throws molotovs to overcook you!
- A hefty deep dish pizza that can tank much more than your own thin crust!

name: Pizzakai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD A10 5700
  • Memory: 8GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 291 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD A10 5700
  • Memory: 8GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 291 MB available space

short_description: Play as a deceased man by the name of Peppy who has been recently reincarnated as a freshly baked Pizza mobster. Offered a deal by a "Pizza God," Peppy must enter the crime den of the House of Unified Triple-Cheeses and engage in combat if he wants any chance of returning to his own world.
